mapper.select: SELECT cropName FROM crop WHERE cropId = #{cropId}
SELECT className FROM class WHERE classId = #{classId}

select trainingReportName,batch,url,cropName from trainingReport left join file on file.connectId=trainingReport.trainingReportId left join crop on crop.cropId=trainingReport.cropId where trainingReportId=#{trainingReportId} and fileType=#{fileType}

select studentName,teacherName,className,gradeName,trainingReportName,batch,url,comments,score,cropName from trainingReport left join student on student.studentId=trainingReport.studentId left join class on class.classId=student.classId left join grade on grade.gradeId=student.gradeId left join teacher on teacher.teacherId=trainingReport.teacherId left join file on file.connectId=trainingReportId left join crop on crop.cropId=trainingReport.cropId where trainingReportId=#{trainingReportId} and fileType=#{fileType}
select as_teacherclass.teacherId from student left join as_teacherclass on as_teacherclass.classId=student.classId where student.studentId=#{studentId}
